examplePhrases: Alexa, apri Paradise Playlist
Alexa, chiedi a Paradise Playlist la playlist
Alexa, chiedi a Paradise Playlist cosa sta giocando
it-IT.name: Paradise Playlist
it-IT.description:
Ascoltando Radio Paradise e c'è questa bella canzone ma non sai di cosa si tratta? Ora puoi chiedere ad Alexa cosa sta suonando attualmente, tra cui artista, canzone, album e anno di uscita.

Questa abilità è un progetto di fan non ufficiale.

Suggerimenti per il miglioramento e feedback su https://github.com/sgruendel/alexa-radio-paradise/issues/new.

examplePhrases: Alexa, öffne Paradise Playlist
Alexa, frage Paradise Playlist was gerade läuft
Alexa, frage Paradise Playlist nach dem aktuellen Song
de-DE.name: Paradise Playlist
de-DE.description:
Du hörst Radio Paradise und möchtest wissen, was das für ein cooler Song ist der momentan läuft? Jetzt kannst du Alexa fragen, was gerade gespielt wird und erfährst Künstler/Band, Titel, Album und Jahr der Veröffentlichung.

Dieser Skill ist ein inoffizielles Fan-Projekt.

Verbesserungsvorschläge und Feedback gerne unter https://github.com/sgruendel/alexa-radio-paradise/issues/new.

examplePhrases: Alexa, open Paradise Playlist
Alexa, ask Paradise Playlist what's playing
Alexa, ask Paradise Playlist about current song
en-CA.name: Paradise Playlist
en-CA.description:
Listening to Radio Paradise and there's this cool song but you don't know what it is? Now you can ask Alexa for what's currently playing, including artist, song, album and year of release.

This skill is an unofficial fan project.

Suggestions for improvement and feedback welcome via https://github.com/sgruendel/alexa-radio-paradise/issues/new.

examplePhrases: Alexa, abre Paradise Playlist
Alexa, pide a Paradise Playlist qué está jugando
Alexa, pide a Paradise Playlist por lista de reproducción
es-ES.name: Paradise Playlist
es-ES.description:
Escuchando Radio Paradise y hay una canción genial, ¿pero no sabes qué es? Ahora puede preguntarle a Alexa qué está reproduciendo actualmente, incluido el artista, la canción, el álbum y el año de lanzamiento.

Esta habilidad es un proyecto de fan no oficial.

Sugerencias de mejora y comentarios en https://github.com/sgruendel/alexa-radio-paradise/issues/new.

examplePhrases: Alexa, ouvre Paradise Playlist
Alexa, lance Paradise Playlist
Alexa, demande à Paradise Playlist la playlist
fr-FR.name: Paradise Playlist
fr-FR.description:
En écoutant Radio Paradise, il y a cette chanson géniale mais vous ne savez pas ce que c'est? Vous pouvez maintenant demander à Alexa ce qui est en cours de lecture, notamment l'artiste, la chanson, l'album et l'année de sortie.

Cette compétence est un projet de fan non officiel.

Suggestions d’amélioration et commentaires sur https://github.com/sgruendel/alexa-radio-paradise/issues/new.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Changes to previous version (lambda version 4):
* Add Italian, French and Spanish locales.

See http://www.radioparadise.com for current playlist and give it a listen!
